Hist\u00f3ria espetacular\\, \u00f3timos: A great horror graphic adventure. Its like a movie that runs 6 to 8 hours\, you have eight characters and with your decisions some live and some die. Its a lot like Heavy Rain\, not as good\, but it has a great story and impressive graphics. Its better than Beyond 2 souls\, so if you like that\, this is way better.If you like slasher horror films and graphic adventures\, then you will love Until Dawn.
